title: Emerald Blossom Neckpiece - A Delicate Floral Haaram
materials: South Sea Pearls (approx. 10mm). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This necklace features a delicate floral design, intricately set with sparkling Cubic Zirconia. The central pendant showcases a striking emerald surrounded by CZ accents and adorned with lustrous South Sea pearl drops. The chain is designed with alternating heart and floral motifs, blending traditional and modern aesthetics. The setting style provides maximum brilliance for the CZs.
colors: Creamy White (Pearls). The contrast between the gold and emeralds creates a rich
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to add a touch of elegance. Suitable for Sangeet or modern Mehendi ceremonies as well.
description: This necklace offers a modern interpretation of the classic Haaram. The combination of high-quality materials, meticulous craftsmanship, and elegant design makes it a timeless treasure. The emeralds are carefully selected for their vibrant color and clarity. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance, making it a valuable investment.
